#summary Projects powered by the Java Wikipedia API (bliki engine).
#sidebar TableOfContents

== Powered by ==
  * [http://code.google.com/p/danblog/ Danblog] Blog written for Google Appengine
  * [http://code.google.com/p/vosao Vosao Content Management System] ([http://www.vosao.org/author/doc/wiki more about the wiki engine integration])
  * [http://solowiki.sourceforge.net/ SoloWiki] (GPL license) is a stand-alone editor designed to help Mediawiki users.
  * [http://www.jamwiki.org JAMWiki.org] (LGPL license) offers many of the features of [http://mediawiki.org/ Mediawiki] (for using the Bliki engine see [JAMWikiIntegration])
  * [http://www.uniblogger.com uniBlogger.com] - a JAMWiki performance branch sandbox using a modified bliki Parser addon.
  * [http://www.codexwiki.org CodexWiki] (Apache license) is a ColdFusion Enterprise Wiki built on Coldbox, Transfer and ColdSpring.
  * [http://code.google.com/p/scalaris/ Scalaris] - a distributed key-value store (see the [http://code.google.com/p/scalaris/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2Fcontrib%2Fwikipedia Wikipedia example])
  * [https://github.com/mdoering/wikipedia-dwca] - a parser for wikipedia species pages using the taxabox template. 
  * [https://github.com/infinity0/proxy-doclet/tree/e5ff33f62166a111b18f765546e1948f7d902c5c]  - Java-doclet Wiki markup Extension
  * [https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/marksy/glncdocnokppgopgpblpeohhhcjggbnl?hl=en Marksy - a Chrome browser extension that tries to convert any flavor of markup]
